humble_origin: I remember a time when I had nothing but a dream and a rusty microphone, as a humble #preacher_occupation#.
My ministry began in a small, leaky garage, with only a handful of faithful souls, and I, a simple #preacher_occupation#.
The Lord called me from the humblest of beginnings, a simple #preacher_occupation#.
initial_message: My message was simple: faith can move mountains, even molehills!
I preached about the power of a mustard seed, and how it can grow into a mighty oak of prosperity.
The Lord revealed to me a truth: your blessings are tied to your giving.
small_miracle: Just last week, a viewer sent in their last $10, and their broken washing machine was instantly repaired!
A faithful sister, who sowed a seed of $20, found a forgotten $50 bill in an old coat!
Through prayer and a humble offering, a family's lost pet returned home, unharmed!
first_call_to_action: Now, if you believe in the power of small beginnings, sow a seed of $#seed_faith_amount#!
Help us reach just a few more souls! Send your best offering of $#seed_faith_amount# today!
For just $#seed_faith_amount#, you can be a part of this divine movement!
ministry_expansion_claim: Our ministry is expanding, reaching millions across the globe!
The Lord has blessed us with unprecedented growth, touching lives in every continent!
From humble beginnings, we are now a beacon of hope to countless souls worldwide!
new_asset_acquisition: We've just acquired a new #ministry_asset_type# to further God's work!
The Lord has provided us with a magnificent #ministry_asset_type# for His glory!
Through your generous giving, we now have a state-of-the-art #ministry_asset_type#!
grand_promise: Sow a seed today, and watch as your #earthly_blessings_promised# manifest tenfold!
With your faithful contribution, you will unlock #heavenly_rewards_promised# beyond your wildest dreams!
Expect a #divine_intervention_type# miracle in your life when you give generously!
increased_offering_request: We need your most generous offering of $#donation_amount# to continue this divine expansion!
The Lord is calling for a sacrificial gift of $#donation_amount# to build His kingdom!
For just $#donation_amount#, you can secure your place in this global revival!
crisis_event: We are facing a storm of #scandal_type#!
The enemy has launched a vicious attack with #scandal_type#!
A dark cloud of #scandal_type# threatens to engulf our ministry!
scandal_impact: Our #follower_loyalty# is being tested, but our faith remains unshaken!
The #media_attention# is intense, but God is greater!
We are under #opposition_strength# like never before, but victory is at hand!
divine_intervention_plea: Only a mighty move of God can deliver us from this #crisis_event#!
We need a #divine_intervention_type# breakthrough, a miracle of epic proportions!
The Lord has shown me that #spiritual_breakthrough_imminent# is upon us, but we must act!

options.text: I've received a #heavenly_vision_clarity# vision for a #global_crusade_planned# that will shake the nations! We are called to build a #media_empire_size# media empire!
The Lord has revealed a #divine_strategy_revealed# to overcome all adversity and usher in a new era!
We are called to build a #media_empire_size# that will reach every corner of the earth!

grand_vision_unveiling.fallback: The Lord has a plan, and it is grand!

sacrificial_offering_request: To overcome this crisis and fund this grand vision, we need a sacrificial offering of $#donation_amount# from every faithful believer!
The Lord is calling for a #personal_sacrifice_made# from you today, a seed of $#donation_amount# that will unlock unprecedented blessings!
This is not a time for small giving! We need $#donation_amount# to secure our #spiritual_legacy_secured#!
rebirth_claim: Through the ashes of adversity, our ministry has risen, stronger than ever!
The Lord has delivered us from the jaws of #scandal_type#, and we stand victorious!
What the enemy meant for evil, God has turned for good, and our #follower_loyalty# is soaring!

options.text: My friends, I've received a fresh anointing, a new word for this generation: a divine revelation!
We are entering a season of spiritual breakthrough, where spiritual gifts will be commonplace!
The Lord has called us to a healing revival that will sweep across the land!

new_message_focus.fallback: The Lord is doing a new thing!

renewed_plea_intensity: Now, more than ever, we need your unwavering support! Your seed of $#donation_amount# will secure your #heavenly_rewards_promised#!
This is a critical moment! Stand with us with your most generous offering of $#donation_amount#, and witness #earthly_blessings_promised#!
The harvest is plentiful, but the laborers are few! Send your best gift of $#donation_amount# and become a #disciple_count# maker!
legacy_reflection: As I reflect on this incredible journey, I see the hand of God in every step, every miracle, every offering. This is my legacy.
My life has been a testament to His faithfulness, and your generosity has made it all possible. This is our shared legacy.
We've built a #media_empire_size# media empire for the Lord, and secured a #spiritual_legacy_secured# spiritual legacy for generations to come.
final_offering_call: Now, as we approach the culmination of this divine work, I ask for one final, ultimate offering of $#donation_amount#!
This is your last chance to sow into this fertile ground! A seed of $#donation_amount# will ensure your place in eternity!
For the glory of God, and the future of this ministry, I call upon you to give your very best, a final offering of $#donation_amount#!

main_sermon_orchestrator.fallback: The Lord works in mysterious ways. Please reset the career_stage variable.
